33/*
34 * v_redraw -- ^L, ^R
35 * Redraw the screen.
36 *
37 * PUBLIC: int v_redraw __P((SCR *, VICMD *));
38 */
39int
40v_redraw(SCR *sp, VICMD *vp)
41{
42 return (sp->gp->scr_refresh(sp, 1));
43}
